storyInfo: A truck plows into the courtroom, putting a halt to Texas's trial.

attributes.content: As far as she was concerned, she's always lived life the exact same way. But, to other peopleâ€”
She was just like a Siracusan.
Was she just like a Siracusan?
She didn't know.
All she remembers is what she once said to her grandfather:
'People who keep going on and on about how life in Siracusa is nobler, or about life in Columbia is nobler, are all full of it.'
To which he laughed heartily.
The high-profile case of Ministro Carracci's assassination is about to be heard in court.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: But it seems that only a small number of invitees are being allowed inside the courtroom, for security reasons.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Everyone else is waiting around the rione della giustizia for the outcome of the trial.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The courthouse is encircled by guards, but nevertheless, a large crowd has formed.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: It appears the death of Ministro Carracci has touched the hearts of the citizenry.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: We will continue to report on this situation as it develops, so stay tuned.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Sora, are you ready?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You two can go, if you want, while I'm performing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's alright. Even if we showed up, it's not like we'd be able to get in.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah, all we can do is sit tight and wait for the verdict.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And you break a leg out there.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't worry about me. I'm already in the right headspace.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sora, are you ready? Almost time for curtain.
attributes.name: Actress

attributes.content: Be right there!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Volsinii Courthouse
Quiet, please. Court is now in session.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The outcome of today's trial will be made public to all citizens of Volsinii.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The case being heard today is the assassination of Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici, Carracci.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Bring the defendant to the stand.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So... that's Texas?
attributes.name: Curious Spectator

attributes.content: Look at the color of her eyes and hair. There's no mistaking it! She's a Texas!
attributes.name: Noisy Spectator

attributes.content: How is she still alive?
attributes.name: Curious Spectator

attributes.content: She murdered Carracci?
attributes.name: Noisy Spectator

attributes.content: Silence!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Cellinia Texas, you were present at the murder of Ministro Carracci.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I was.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I planted the bomb and detonated it as il Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici was walking by.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She straight up admitted it?!
attributes.name: Curious Spectator

attributes.content: This is the last Texas...? How the mighty have fallen!
attributes.name: Noisy Spectator

attributes.content: What was your motive?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I had none.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Who gave you the order?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No one.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: In other words, you acted alone?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Impossible! How'd you get your hands on a bomb, and when did you have the opportunity to plant it?
attributes.name: Critical Juror

attributes.content: Does that matter?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Did you come to take revenge for Famiglia Texas?
attributes.name: Suspicious Juror

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Suspicious Juror

attributes.content: Your Honor, I've confessed to everything.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I believe there's no need for these two mafiosi in the juror's box to be so rowdy.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: How dare you!
attributes.name: Critical Juror

attributes.content: Can we just skip all the boring procedures?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Leon, what are you still doing here?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I thought you'd be at the courthouse.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Is it really so surprising, Demetri?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Would you like a drink?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Let's skip the morning booze. I'll prepare some refreshing fruit juice for you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Get me a whiskey, the strongest we have.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And then, answer my question.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: How'd you guess?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Simple.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The attack on me and the assassination of Carracci both prove that someone wants the Dodici Famiglie at each other's throats.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And as Lavinia is a Bellone spokeswoman on the topic, she can't be allowed to find the murderer, or she would be able to bring the situation under control.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Therefore, now that Lavinia has arrested Cellinia, the other side can't let the trial proceed.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So, what has to happen to Lavinia?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Fortunately, things didn't work out for you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You might not have realized it yet, but she's already influenced you a great deal.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: It's making you question your decisions more and more.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And through her influence on you, she might come to believe that she's capable of something.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I have to nip that flight of fancy in the bud.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Funny how you talk all confident-like.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Actually, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Doing this brings me no joy, or peace of mind.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I didn't want to wait to the very end to tell you the outcome and force you to accept it.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So, it's just like you said. Fortunately, things didn't work out for me.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But that didn't stop you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We can take all the time in the world settling this score.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Speaking of which, the safest option was to have Cellinia die mysteriously on the eve of the trial, but that didn't happen.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Proving... that the other side is afraid of her.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: After all, even if we set aside her being the last Texas, she's still a guest of the Don.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In other words, the only ones willing to let this opportunity slip by... are from this famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Lo and behold, nobody made any attempts on Cellinia's life yesterday.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What if the other side anticipated your trap and purposefully held off?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If they're set on challenging Signora Sicilia's authority, you'd expect there to be a lot of commotion. So I did a bit of research into which famiglie have been the most active over the last couple days.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And it turns out... You, Demetri, are behind all of this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I must admit, I did not expect Signorina Cellinia to stand trial for someone else's crime.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I figured it wouldn't make a difference whether or not she was involved in our plan, but by the looks of things, I really should have thought that part through.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Don't be too hard on yourself. If she didn't come out and say she was fine bearing the stain of this crime, I wouldn't have thought of it either.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So in that case, you should show her your gratitude.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Of course I will. But before that, I have to ask: why, Demetri?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Isn't it obvious? I'm the traitor in the famiglia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'd be more willing to believe that everyone else is a traitor before you.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If I can't trust you, then who?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon, what do you think about this new nomadic city?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Obviously, it's a new way of dividing up the spoils.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Whoever has the last laugh will be the big winner.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Sure, but I see it more as a testing ground for Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Let the Dodici Famiglie fight amongst each other here in the name of building a new city.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The new generation of cubs vent their repressed violence, while the old wolves turn their eyes to a new prize.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Pretty great, huh? With Columbia's return to the fold, the stagnant cesspool that is Siracusa gets a new lease on life.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: No matter who wins in the end, it all works out for the woman at the top of Grey Hall, Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Wait, you don't mean...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You've done a great job these past few years. You suppressed the other famiglie, and took control of il Ministero dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: If things keep going that way, the Bellones will get that last laugh.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But what will it accomplish?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Our famiglia gets absolute control over the new nomadic city, and after that, it's back to business as usual.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And you want more than that. Or rather, he wants more than that?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Since Grey Hall was established, since the Dodici Famiglie were prohibited from warring against one another, who has ever really been content?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We used to be hungry, unscrupulous wolves, and the struggles between our famiglie were bloody and endless.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But now, the newest generation of cubs is all nice and comfy in their shackles.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: They're used to coexisting with other famiglie. They find solutions to conflicts. They argue with each other in Grey Hall over what you call dividing up the spoils.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We never did any of that. No need to.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So he wants to overthrow the Grey Hall?! But how?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: One individual has allowed the famiglie to act independently, but she will never permit them to violate her ironclad law. There can't be any fighting in broad daylight.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: We were about to win, and only under these conditions could our sudden fall from power get the attention of the jealous famiglie.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Wolves fight. That's nature. They don't hold back at the smell of blood, no matter how domesticated they've become.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: They tear into each other, claws, fangs, and all.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That's how we get this particular individual to step out of Grey Hall.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And we'll all be waiting for that one moment.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: 'Crack.' The crisp sound of glass shattering echoes across the empty room.
The pup is unaware of the wounds caused by the splinters.
We'll get the last laugh, Leon.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And when we do, we'll control more than just a new city. We'll have all of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That's what your father, Bernardo Bellone, who single-handedly made the Bellones the most powerful of the Dodici Famiglie, wants for us.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You're wrong.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I haven't stopped you. Or I guess I should say, you still have a backup plan, right?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You knew from the very beginning that you'd be found out, so you waited here for me on purpose.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The reason I'm here... is because I figured I had to face up to your anger.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I owe you an apology, both as your closest friend, and as your soldier.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I don't expect you to forgive me, but I at least want you to know that I didn't sleep well doing what I did.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Stop talking like you're giving a victory speech!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: ...I lost, Leon. Really.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But maybe, this is just the kind of place Siracusa is. Just maybe, the Don's ambitions were right.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Just as I was about to admit defeat, she appeared.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: A lunatic.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Tell me, Gambino. Can you guess the best way to ruin somebody's day?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Huh? Take his head clean off, right?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: What do you think, Capone?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Find his friends and family. Kill 'em one by one, sit him down, and treat him to a slideshow with their pictures.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: *sigh*... That's why I always say you two will never amount to anything.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Hah, then let's hear your bright idea.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: His faith, my friends. His faith.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You destroy his faith?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Destroy? No, how could you destroy a man's faith with your hands? That can't be done.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But you give him a gentle push, and let him watch his faith fall right out of the sky.
attributes.name: Lappland
Lappland
attributes.content: And then, whooshâ€”

attributes.name: Lappland
attributes.content: Crash!
It shatters into a million little pieces.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And how do you get a man to shatter his faith so easily?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Oh, no, no. You misunderstand me. Faith is pure and clean, but life is filthy.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: 'So easily'?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: A better question is, how could it be hard?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So... does this have somethin' to do with us gettin' you that truck.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Hah, I get it. You're gonna run over that judge to shake Texas up, right?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Does she come across as the kind of woman who'd break down over one dead judge?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What are you gonna do then?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: You're the Lappland who was exiled from Famiglia Saluzzo. Why are you here in Volsinii?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Wait, how'd you even get back into Siracusa?!
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You know how the Bellones have a connection with Cellinia that nobody knows about? I got me a connection with the Saluzzo name that'd make you retch.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So, you're here on their behalf?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You could say that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: By the way, I think you should probably put the weapons you have under the table.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Dying here won't do you or your plans any good.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Let's make a deal, Bellone cub.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You want the case dismissed, don't you?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I can help with that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Is that... what Alberto Saluzzo wants?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm his daughter, and I know him better than anyone.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Haven't you been dying to find out exactly what I'm doing back in Siracusa?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's simple. I need her to understand...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That Siracusa is a swamp. You don't get to just wade your way out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: That goes for all of us.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: As such, you confess to having committed all the aforementioned acts?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I was.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Very well. I hereby proclaim that Cellinia Texas is guilty of murdering Ministro Carracci, Ministro dei Lavori Pubblici.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I pronounce youâ€”
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Critical Juror

attributes.content: What was that sound? Anybody else hear that?
attributes.name: Suspicious Juror

attributes.content: It's... an engine?
attributes.name: Critical Juror

attributes.content: But we're in a courthouse. How could thatâ€”
attributes.name: Suspicious Juror

attributes.content: For the mafiosi of yesteryear, the unspoken rules were held above all else.
Signora Sicilia placed the shackles of the law around the necks of the famiglie.
Thus, a court of law was erected in every Siracusan city.
In Siracusa, the courts stand for Grey Hall's will.
And the judges are executors of Signora Sicilia's will.
The judges inevitably find themselves controlled by the famiglie, sometimes even submitting to them. However, every judge knows there is one line that cannot be crossedâ€”
They must prevent fights between the Dodici Famiglie.
Just as the Dodici all know their every move is always under the watchful eye of Signora Sicilia.
Thus, a delicate balance of power is established through the courts.
But nowâ€”
A declaration of contempt for Signora Sicilia.
A mockery of the very laws of Siracusa.
With an engine's roar squeezed between bouts of high-pitched laughter...
A truck rips through the wall.
And even after crashing its way inside, the engine does not stop.
As if proclaiming to othersâ€”
This is no mere accident, but rather by design.
Aaaaaaahhhâ€”
attributes.name: Critical Juror

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on?! What's a truck doing here?!
attributes.name: Suspicious Juror

attributes.content: Who's the driver? Get out of there this instant!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Heh, not bad. Now that's the face I wanted to see.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Who the hell are you?!
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Ah, yes. Buongiorno, signore e signori.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Allow me to introduce myself.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: My name... is Lappland Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Saluzzo?!
attributes.name: Lavinia
Lappland
attributes.content: I am also...

attributes.name: Lappland
attributes.content: Carracci's true assassin.
Breaking news!
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Just now, someone drove a truck into the courtroom.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: The woman who carried out this jaw-dropping deed just identified herself as Lappland Saluzzo.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: And, she claims to be the one who really assassinated Carracci!
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: At present, Judge Lavinia has suspended the trial and detained this individual.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: We will continue to track the latest developments, so don't go anywhereâ€”
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: When people no longer recognize the stench of blood as blood, it becomes a natural part of society.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Let this be a poignant wake-up call.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: In a city where even the sewers are choked with conspiracy and spilled blood, such fascinating developments can still take place.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: O wolf with a yearning for the wilderness, you never fail to surprise.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: But will you break free of your shackles? That, I do wish to see.
attributes.name: Ben

attributes.content: Over a dozen mobsters lie on the ground, howling.
The only one still standing is a girl holding a longbow.
I never knew city wolves were this weak.
Agnese was right.
She pauses briefly, then suddenly turns to sniff the air.
It's coming from the direction of the warehouse.
Are there other wolves from the wilds in this city?
No... This is not the scent of the wilderness.
But, it's very close to it.
